body.name: Red Magic 6R 5G Factory Unlocked Cell Phone, 6.67" 144Hz Gaming Phone 8GB RAM + 128GB ROM, US Version Dual SIM Android Smartphone, 64MP Camera and 30W Quick Charging 4200mAh NFC Mobile Phone Black
body.stockDetail: Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
features: 【144Hz Ultra-Smooth Display】144Hz refresh rate, 6.67-inch FHD+OLED full screen and 2400*1080 resolution provide you with smooth and beautiful HD+ visual effects, whether you are playing games or surfing the Internet. With 360Hz multi-finger touch sampling rate, the Cell Phone delivers ultra-fast touch and precise response, giving you a serious competitive edge while gaming. The Gaming Phone has also Under-display Fingerprint Sensor and SGS Eye Care Certification.

【Qualcomm Chip and Larger Storage】The Gaming Phone has the Qualcomm Snapdragon 888 5G with CPU: Kryo 680 and GPU: Adreno 660. While obtaining the fastest and most stable connection, play your favorite games with ease with the power of the new CPU clocking up to 2.84G Hz and enjoy Triple-A graphics, thanks to the fast rendering power of the GPU. 8GB RAM + 128GB ROM (LPDDR5+UFS3.1) provides not only a fun gaming experience and effects, also large storage space for game downloads.

【Ultra HD AI Quad Camera】Rear Camera are 64-Megapixel (main camera) + 8-Megapixel (ultra wide angle) + 5-Megapixel (pixel macro) + 2-Megapixel (pixel depth) and support 8K at 30fps, 4K at 60fps/30fps, 1080P at 60fps/30fps, 720P at 30fps. Front Camera is 16-Megapixel and support 1080P/720P at 30fps video recording. Amazing realistic colors and contrast, dynamic tone mapping. And customized ultra-small camera, which effectively increases the ratio of the full screen.

【Cooling System and Shoulder Triggers】Multi-Dimensional Cooling System combines 5 different cooling method such as: VC Liquid Cooling, Graphite Cooling, Thermal Conductive Gel. Heat can be released slowly so you feel less heat from the phone while playing, making it more comfortable to hold the phone. The response time of 2 built-in capacitive touch shoulder triggers is as low as 8.3 ms. Use the built-in shoulder triggers to replace on-screen buttons to improve your game.

【5G Connection and 4200mAh Battery】5G is SA+NSA dual mode and supports all key regions up to 3.0 Gbps uploads, up to 7.5 Gbps downloads. WIFI 6E is up to 3.5Gbps. These bring mobile gaming to a whole new level. Download the latest games and videos in gigabit speeds with ease to show off your smooth, low latency experience. The Android Smartphone with 4200mAh battery allows you to game for hours on a single charge. And Mobile Phone comes with a 30W charger, charge 0-100% in 65 minutes.

【Unlocked For All Carriers】REDMAGIC 6R Smartphone is US Version and unlocked for all carriers and supports below frequency bands. IMPORTANT NOTES: Please Confirm Your SIM Card's frequency bands are included in below Supported Bands before Order. 5G Network is NSA: n41 and SA: n41. 2G+3G+4G Network are B2 (1900) / B5 (850), CDMA BC0 / BC1, WCDMA 2/4/5, EVDO BC0 / BC1, TD-LTE B38 / 40, FDD-LTE B2 / B4 / B5 / B7 / B12 / B17 / B18 / B19 / B26.
body.description: REDMAGIC 6R Gaming Smartphone IMPORTANT NOTES: Please Confirm Your SIM Card's frequency bands are included in below Supported Bands before Order. 2G Network B2 (1900) / B5 (850) CDMA BC0 / BC1 3G Network WCDMA 2/4/5 EVDO BC0 / BC1 4G Network TD-LTE B38 / 40 FDD-LTE B2 / B4 / B5 / B7 / B12 / B17 / B18 / B19 / B26 CA downlink: 2A-2A, 4A-4A, 5A-5A 5G Network NR SA: N41 NSA EN_DC: DC_2A_N41，DC_2C_N41，DC_66A_N41 Basic Parameters Size: 163.04*75.34*7.8mm Weight: 186g Color: Black Material: Metal Middle Frame + Plastic Back Cover Display Size: 6.67 inches Refresh Rate: 144Hz Touch Sampling Rate: 360Hz multi-touch Type: AMOLED SGS Certification low blue light for eye comfort Hardware Qualcomm Snapdragon 888 5G CPU Cores: Kryo 680 CPU Clock Speed: up to 2.84GHz GPU: Adreno 660 Capacity RAM: 8GB (LPDDR5) ROM: 128GB (UFS3.1) Connectivity Wi-Fi: WiFi 6E Bluetooth: Bluetooth 5.2 Positioning: GPS, GLONASS NFC: Yes HDMI: Yes Cameras Rear Camera: 64MP+8MP+2MP+5MP Front Camera: 16MP Sensors Fingerprint, Gravitational acceleration, Gyroscope, Geomagnetic sensor, Proximity sensor, Light sensor Operating System REDMAGIC OS 4.0 based on Android 11.0 Battery & Quick Charging Battery: 4200mAh Quick Charging: 30W quick charging Ports USB 3.0 Type-C, DP, Dual nano-SIM slot Special Functions Shoulder Trigger Buttons: 400Hz touch sampling rate, dual pressure touch buttons In the Box REDMAGIC 6R phone x 1 Clear phone case x 1 Power adapter x 1 Type-C data cable x 1 Type-C to audio adapter x 1 SIM tray ejector x 1

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: Fast Charging Support, 8K Video Recording, Quad Camera, Dual Nano-SIM, Shoulder Trigger Button

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.2 4.2 out of 5 stars 194 ratings 4.2 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A most excellent phone
reviews.reviewText: Tried to think of something I don't like about this phone but I can't it's super fast and can handle everyday tasks with no problem the back of the phone sports a beautiful glass look. It definitely stands out from the other phones that's for sure also comes with a clear case and it looks awesome matches the phone perfectly snapdragon 888 is faster then my last phones chip. Plus don't forget this thing is a gaming phone so it can play anything out there with power to spare. A most excellent phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this phone
reviews.reviewText: It's a great phone all the way around. I use T-Mobile so everything works fine. The 5g and 4g signals are good as well. Coming from a note its a gd upgrade. The refresh rate on the screen is the smoothest I've seen. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for gaming, not for communicating.
reviews.reviewText: Prior reviews of this phone are spot on with their Pros. I love everything gaming about it. The misconception here is that several complain about it not working on US networks. I have mine on Ting and they use T-Mobile and yes it will work on T-Mobile as well. 5G connection is great have no issues with networking either. It will not work on Cricket, been there done that. Cricket was my original provider.Now for the buggy parts. I returned one and now may return another. The issue on both so far is that when I make a call to someone they can't hear me but I hear them. I found out if I put them on speaker phone and then off speaker phone they hear me. Now this only has happened so far on cell to cell calls.The second bug is those I call can hear themselves echo back. No matter what setting I toy with it does not clear it up even with the volume down to almost unhearable. The work around for echo calls is to use a headset. To me this would make me think that there is no buffer between the speaker and mic in the phone and it is not an issue with the service provide.Do not rely on ZTE nubia support if you buy on Amazon they will not offer it. I have reached out to ZTE nubia about this issue and they have ignored me thus far.UPDATE: Upon reading through reviews on another site I was able to find another user with the same issues. He solved the issue with no help from nubia. The fix was simply switching from sim slot one to sim slot two. I did the same and Magic! It worked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sim card issues
reviews.reviewText: Really an awesome phone overall. Just have one compant. When I inserted the SIM card, the phone would not allow me to use it for whatever reason even though I checked that it was compatible with my current phone service provider (Metro by T-Mobile). Just frustrating that I can't use the phone outside my house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars COULD NOT GET IT TO WORK IN 5G WITH T-MOBILE – VERY DISAPPOINTED!
reviews.reviewText: I had very high hopes for this phone judging from the specs and judging by the bands under which it would receive and use 5G. Understanding it is a budget phone with very high-end features, it is useless to me if it cannot work in the 5G realm!That is to say simply that if I'm paying for 5G I expect my phone to work in 5G, and if the phone advertises that it is a 5G phone and that it DOES work with GSM networks, of which T-Mobile is a GSM, then it should NOT say 4G!Even the folks at the local T-Mobile store cannot get it to register as 5G and suggested something could possibly be wrong with the phone or that it needed to be updated. All the updates were installed, so it has to be a defective phone if it is supposed to work in the 5G realm!I am returning it at this point because it is useless to me as is. On many ads from phones it lists the many bands the phone will operate within and even if the bands match the phones capability, it still may not work, and this one did not!This one did NOT come with an adapter for American use. I contacted the company and they NEVER even responded! Changing my rating to ONE!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's worth the money assuming your carrier has the bandwidth for it.
reviews.reviewText: Not sure what discrepancies I should've expected before purchasing considering the nature of the other reviews but, put bluntly and briefly, the phone is phenomenal for it's price tag. Haven't encountered a single bug whatsoever and is impressive through and through. Definitely a must buy when on sale.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Can not get 5G to work
reviews.reviewText: I have had this phone for about a week, now. The phone interface is as responsive as expected. I have enabled all of the 5G options that I can find in the settings, and I have a 5G data plan with AT&T and am in a 5G coverage area, but I have not been able to get the phone in 5G mode no matter where I go. Also, what I thought were stereo speakers on the edge beside the cameras turned out to be left and right shoulder triggers, so all of the sound comes from the right/bottom edge when the phone is turned for horizontal viewing. (edit) While I was using this phone connected to my car via USB Android Auto, music would play very flat with no low-mids or bass, although everything sounded good if connected via bluetooth. Sound equalizer adjustments made no difference at all, and it did not matter what application I used for playing music. I thought it was the car because I had just purchased it recently, as well, but I connected my old phone the same way and it sounded fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast and responsive
reviews.reviewText: A great everyday phone that doesn't look like an obvious gaming phone. Does everything that a reliable android device is capable of doing these days.
Un magnífico celular gamer, sus gatillos ayudan a una mejora del juego, junto con todas sus actitudes, vale la pena.
Me llego a tiempo super rápido buen equipo gracias y confiable su entrega
Nice ProductI haven't used it much yet, but it looks like a good device.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buen equipo, pero le falta pulirse.
reviews.reviewText: El equipo cumple con lo que promete. No tiene la cámara más novedosa, pero no es del todo mala. En general lo que más le falla es el software, a su capa de personalización le falta pulirse mucho, tiene algunos bugs que, si bien no son como para devolverlo, en ocasiones sí llegan a molestar un poco. A pesar de todo estoy contento con mi compra, y espero que pronto Nubia (ZTE) pueda mejorar el software con alguna actualización para poder aprovechar toda la potencia que sí tiene.

reviews.reviewTitle: Llegó súper rápido y es exactamente lo que esperaba.
reviews.reviewText: Súper rápido y cumple con lo que esperaba.
